summary: This is a LATE Alpha/ Early BETA version of my Character. I want him to be able to have his own quest and explain his background and overall, be a REAL companion unlike the unchanging companions in Skyrim Vanilla. THIS IS MY FIRST MOD! Please let me know if I did everything right...
descriptionHtml:
*NOTICE* This is my first mod so I\'m sure I got some things wrong. Please be patient and help me out by informing me of issues and other mistakes I made (and if possible how to fix.)


To\'raji is my Khajiit character in Skyrim and is my first mod. Eventually I will make this to where he talks about his backstory and how/why he came to Skyrim. *NOW VOICED!*

 I got VERY heavy inspiration from FAIR KHAJIIT mod inspired by a friend Darkvalkyr (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8468) who is an amazing author. Even though his mod isnt done, I feel a strong attraction to it right from the start. I hope that I can do something like that with To\'raji. 

I have been getting a lot of help and motivation to make this mod due to a good friend KHAJIITAS so please stop by his page, give him some endorsements or even a thank you! His link is below.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4727757/? 

ALSO: For those wishing to speak/see him, He is currently at RiverWood\'s Sleeping Giant Inn.
author: Nighkomoro

files.name: Toraji the Khajiit
files.changelogHtml: Fixed the never-ending loop of hate if you refuse to help him. He now carried a ebony BOW instead of Dagger. Also, no longer naked

files.name: Toraji the Khajiit
files.changelogHtml: FINALLY got him to stay put in the Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn with his clothes on. (Linwe's gear)

files.name: Toraji the Khajiit
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a few dialouge issues and added a bit more to it so that the player isnt as confused with the initial dialouge. Also, added animations to him while he was speaking.

files.name: Toraji the Khajiit
files.changelogHtml: Added 2 versions: Original and Dawnguard version. Dawnguard version is closer to what To'raji is really like. 1 dialouge choice is unvoiced. TO DO LIST'ed it.
